page.title: 07Transport
page.content: Only two major roads run through this area. They are the{A635}and the{A6024. The{B6106}also runs to Penistone from Holmfirth. Most roads in the area are minor roads and some are unmade. Buses run on the main roads to Holmbridge, Holme and Parkhead from Huddersfield. They are often littered. The nearest B.R.{railway station}is at Brockholes. The nearest{airports are Manchester or Leeds and Bradford. The nearest motorways are the{M1}and {M62. Most people use cars to travel around the area. They get their petrol from Holmfirth Coachworks, Burnlee and sometimes have their cars repaired by Mr.T.Battye, who has worked on his own in Hinchliffe Mill servicing cars for 33 years.
